sentences.sentence: “Pectorals are the motor for 80 percent of flight,” said Dr. Tobalske, which explains why they are the largest part of the anatomy.
sentences.translation: “胸肌担负了飞行中80%的动力来源，”托巴尔斯克博士说，这也解释了为什么在鸟类解剖形态中，胸肌所占的比重最大。

sentences.sentence: His dorsal fin was down and his huge pectorals were spread wide.
sentences.translation: 它的脊鳍朝下耷拉着，巨大的胸鳍大张着。
